    • Uses of Rule in amie.mining

      Methods in amie.mining that return types with arguments of type Rule 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Rule> AMIE.mine()
      The key method which returns a set of rules mined from the KB based on the AMIE object's configuration.
